attributes.comment:
Please reconsider the raising of the costs to file with USCIS just to adopt. The
costs are already hundreds of dollars. Plus, with the wait for adoptions (in many
cases) longer than 18 months, many forms expire and we have to re-file and get re-
fingerprinted. That already doubles the cost. With having to file twice AND the
price increase, the cost to file with USCIS for adoption increases over 140% for a
couple!!! There are no increases in services--it is a staggering increase for the
same services we already receive.

I urge you to reconsider this enormous increase in cost.

Adoptive Parent--Carrie Piparo
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Carrie Piparo
